metadata.name: Amplitude (Actions)
metadata.description: Amplitude is an event tracking and segmentation platform for your web and mobile apps. By analyzing the actions your users perform, you can gain a better understanding to drive retention, engagement, and conversion.

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.description: Amplitude project API key. You can find this key in the "General" tab of your Amplitude project.

endpoint.label: Endpoint Region
endpoint.description: The region to send your data.

secretKey.label: Secret Key
secretKey.description: Amplitude project secret key. You can find this key in the "General" tab of your Amplitude project.

presets.name: Browser Session Tracking
presets.trigger: type = "track" or type = "identify" or type = "group" or type = "page" or type = "alias"
